languages.text: "В моем архиве нет данных об инциденте на "Герметико". Это судно было ставкой благословенного Амарната. Значит, он... утрачен?" {n}Голос Паскаля наполняется тревогой.{/n}
"My archive has no data on the Hermetico incident. The vessel was the blessed Amarnat's base of operations. Is it... lost, then?" {n}Pasqal's voice is filled with anxiety.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В моем архиве нет данных об инциденте на "Герметико". Это судно было ставкой благословенного Амарната. Значит, он... утрачен?" {n}Голос Паскаля наполняется тревогой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "My archive has no data on the Hermetico incident. The vessel was the blessed Amarnat's base of operations. Is it... lost, then?" {n}Pasqal's voice is filled with anxiety.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「自分のアーカイブにはヘルメティコ事件のデータはありません。船は祝福されしアマルナトの作戦の本拠地でした。つまりは…失われたのか？」{n}パスカルの声は心配げだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My archive has no data on the Hermetico incident. The vessel was the blessed Amarnat's base of operations. Is it... lost, then?" {n}Pasqal's voice is filled with anxiety.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「自分のアーカイブにはヘルメティコ事件のデータはありません。船は祝福されしアマルナトの作戦の本拠地でした。つまりは…失われたのか？」{n}パスカルの声は心配げだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我的档案中并没有关于‘隐士之舟号’的事故记录。那艘虚空舰曾是蒙福者阿玛纳特的行动基地。也就是说，它……失去踪迹了吗？”{n}帕斯卡的声音中充满了焦虑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My archive has no data on the Hermetico incident. The vessel was the blessed Amarnat's base of operations. Is it... lost, then?" {n}Pasqal's voice is filled with anxiety.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我的档案中并没有关于‘隐士之舟号’的事故记录。那艘虚空舰曾是蒙福者阿玛纳特的行动基地。也就是说，它……失去踪迹了吗？”{n}帕斯卡的声音中充满了焦虑。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "In meinem Archiv gibt es keine Daten über den Hermetico-Vorfall. Das Schiff war die Operationsbasis des gesegneten Amarnat. Ist es damit ... verschollen?" {n}In Pasqals Stimme liegt Besorgnis.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My archive has no data on the Hermetico incident. The vessel was the blessed Amarnat's base of operations. Is it... lost, then?" {n}Pasqal's voice is filled with anxiety.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "In meinem Archiv gibt es keine Daten über den Hermetico-Vorfall. Das Schiff war die Operationsbasis des gesegneten Amarnat. Ist es damit ... verschollen?" {n}In Pasqals Stimme liegt Besorgnis.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Mes archives ne contiennent aucune donnée sur l'incident de l'Hermetico. Ce vaisseau était la base d'opérations du saint Amarnat. Est-ce à dire qu'il est... irrémédiablement perdu ? » {n}La voix de Pasqal trahit une grande détresse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My archive has no data on the Hermetico incident. The vessel was the blessed Amarnat's base of operations. Is it... lost, then?" {n}Pasqal's voice is filled with anxiety.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mes archives ne contiennent aucune donnée sur l'incident de l'Hermetico. Ce vaisseau était la base d'opérations du saint Amarnat. Est-ce à dire qu'il est... irrémédiablement perdu ? » {n}La voix de Pasqal trahit une grande détresse.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Mi archivo no tiene datos sobre el incidente en la Hermetico. Aquella nave era la base de operaciones del bendito Amarnat. ¿Entonces... se ha perdido?». {n}La voz de Pasqal está llena de ansiedad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My archive has no data on the Hermetico incident. The vessel was the blessed Amarnat's base of operations. Is it... lost, then?" {n}Pasqal's voice is filled with anxiety.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi archivo no tiene datos sobre el incidente en la Hermetico. Aquella nave era la base de operaciones del bendito Amarnat. ¿Entonces... se ha perdido?». {n}La voz de Pasqal está llena de ansiedad.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Benim arşivimde Hermetico olayına dair veri bulunmuyor. Gemi, kutsanmış Amarnat'ın faaliyet üssüydü. Kayboldu şimdi, öyle mi?" {n}Pasqal'ın sesi kaygı dolu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My archive has no data on the Hermetico incident. The vessel was the blessed Amarnat's base of operations. Is it... lost, then?" {n}Pasqal's voice is filled with anxiety.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Benim arşivimde Hermetico olayına dair bir veri bulunmuyor. Gemi, kutsanmış Amarnat'ın faaliyet üssüydü. Kaybedildi o hâlde?" {n}Pasqal'ın sesi kaygı dolu.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
